A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The production quality is good\, and there are certainly unexpected twists. If that is enough for you\, then you may like this film. However\, it sweeps aside all of Abrams \"mystery box\" stuff from the previous film\, and it contains multiple scenes which defy credulity. Worst of all\, it fails to understand\, and damages\, the character of Luke Skywalker - the man who believed there was still good in Darth Vader worth fighting for.
